episode.title: Slow-Moving Hurricane
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Craig Hockenberry returns to the show to talk about the demise of third-party Twitter clients, the overall Twitter shitshow, touchscreens on the Mac, and the perils of autocorrect when you have a clever username.
